data.text: @EmmaLori88 Hi Emma, thanks for your patience. We don't have a list of prams, however, you can take your pram as carry on and depending on the size, this can be checked in at the gate. Feel free to DM us if you have any further questions. Kevin https://t.co/K8pFuJSEsT

urls.title: Frequent Flyer | Qantas
urls.description: Information and contact details for Frequent Flyer and Qantas Club members looking for help with account queries, reward bookings and more.

data.text: @anthonysalamon Hi Anthony, we're sorry to hear this. Please DM us your query along with your membership number and full name so our Frequent Flyer team can check this. Alternatively, you can reach our Frequent Flyer team via this link: https://t.co/5cg8GLYUgY. Kevin https://t.co/K8pFuJSEsT
